headline.main: Iowa Republican Leaders Say They Will Continue Straw Poll
headline.print_headline: Iowa Republican Leaders Say They Will Continue Straw Poll

docs.lead_paragraph: Iowa Republicans will hold an unofficial poll this summer to gauge how the party's presidential hopefuls are faring before the state chooses a candidate for president in 2016, party leaders said on Saturday.
docs.snippet: Iowa Republicans will hold an unofficial poll this summer to gauge how the party's presidential hopefuls are faring before the state chooses a candidate for president in 2016, party leaders said on Saturday....

headline.main: Prophetic Perrin Hopes for Better Pitch in Brisbane
headline.print_headline: Prophetic Perrin Hopes for Better Pitch in Brisbane

docs.lead_paragraph: Alain Perrin may have found the Lang Park surface 'very, very, very bad' but his side's lucky 1-0 victory over Asian heavyweights Saudi Arabia at least fulfilled his prediction from two months ago.
docs.snippet: Alain Perrin may have found the Lang Park surface 'very, very, very bad' but his side's lucky 1-0 victory over Asian heavyweights Saudi Arabia at least fulfilled his prediction from two months ago....

headline.main: Prince Ali Calls for 10-Year Reform of 'Secretive' FIFA
headline.print_headline: Prince Ali Calls for 10-Year Reform of 'Secretive' FIFA

docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA presidential candidate Prince Ali Bin Al Hussein will launch a 10-year program to restore confidence in soccer's "secretive" world governing body if elected.
docs.snippet: FIFA presidential candidate Prince Ali Bin Al Hussein will launch a 10-year program to restore confidence in soccer's "secretive" world governing body if elected....

headline.main: No Ukraine Summit Without Progress on Peace Plan, Merkel Tells Putin
headline.print_headline: No Ukraine Summit Without Progress on Peace Plan, Merkel Tells Putin

docs.lead_paragraph: German Chancellor Angela Merkel told Russian President Vladimir Putin on the phone on Saturday that a four-way summit to discuss the situation in eastern Ukraine would not take place until there was real progress on the Minsk peace plan.
docs.snippet: German Chancellor Angela Merkel told Russian President Vladimir Putin on the phone on Saturday that a four-way summit to discuss the situation in eastern Ukraine would not take place until there was real progress on the Minsk peace plan....

headline.main: Charlie Hebdo gunman says funded by al Qaeda preacher Anwar Al Awlaki
headline.sub: Charlie Hebdo gunman says funded by al Qaeda preacher Anwar Al Awlaki

docs.lead_paragraph: One of the Charlie Hebdo gunmen tells French TV he was funded by Anwar Al Awlaki, an influential international recruiter for al Qaeda. Nathan Frandino reports.
docs.snippet: One of the Charlie Hebdo gunmen tells French TV he was funded by Anwar Al Awlaki, an influential international recruiter for al Qaeda. Nathan Frandino reports....

headline.main: Strong Quake Rocks Philippines Capital, No Damage, Injuries
headline.print_headline: Strong Quake Rocks Philippines Capital, No Damage, Injuries

docs.lead_paragraph: Philippine seismologists say a magnitude-6 earthquake has jolted the capital, Manila, rousing people from their sleep. There are no immediate reports of damage or injuries.
docs.snippet: Philippine seismologists say a magnitude-6 earthquake has jolted the capital, Manila, rousing people from their sleep. There are no immediate reports of damage or injuries....

headline.main: England's Injured Morgan Set to Miss Six Nations
headline.print_headline: England's Injured Morgan Set to Miss Six Nations

docs.lead_paragraph: England number eight Ben Morgan is likely to miss the entire Six Nations campaign after fracturing his left leg in Gloucester's 24-23 win over Saracens in the Premiership on Friday.
docs.snippet: England number eight Ben Morgan is likely to miss the entire Six Nations campaign after fracturing his left leg in Gloucester's 24-23 win over Saracens in the Premiership on Friday....

headline.main: Sleeper Cell Awakes France's Worst Fears in 3 Days of Terror
headline.print_headline: Sleeper Cell Awakes France's Worst Fears in 3 Days of Terror

docs.lead_paragraph: Blood-curdling, al-Qaida-inspired murder that tore at the heart of the nation which raised him wasn't ghoulish enough for Cherif Kouachi. His body, felled by elite soldiers' bullets and stun grenades, wasn't yet cold when he also came back from the dead.

headline.main: Clippers Thrash Mavericks 120-100 for 6th Win in 8 Games
headline.print_headline: Clippers Thrash Mavericks 120-100 for 6th Win in 8 Games

docs.lead_paragraph: The Clippers have been playing with big leads in their last two games and not blowing them.
